• I Built A New Site, Again

I updated my site a few weeks ago (it looked very similar to this). It was rushed for no reason, and I wasn't very happy with it. In the last few weeks, I rebuilt Svbstrate completely – and learned a ton – so I decided to make a new site. But better this time.

Nominal Theme. Made with Svbstrate.
